fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Single market, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: EU legislative activities and policies regarding energy and climate issues, in particular: energy efficiency, GHG emissions, EU ETS, cogeneration as well as subjects such as taxation, public procurement and concessions. Examples of files: the Energy Efficiency Directive, the EU ETS Directive, 2030 Climate and Energy Framework, Directives on Concessions and Public Procurement.
organisation_name: European Federation of Intelligent Energy Efficiency Services (EFIEES)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: CLÉRO#Jeremy, DE CASTRO GONZALEZ#Luisa, Endellini#Alessia, PLAINEMAISON#Valérie, THOMAS#Bernard
membership:
The Coalition for Energy Savings, E3PO 
Informal alliances/coalitions: the Heat Coalition, Energy Efficiency Industrial Forum
relevant_communication:
Event: “Boosting energy-efficiency services markets for building renovation and system efficiency”, co-organised on 22 June 2017 with other organisations in the framework of the 2017 edition of the European Sustainable Energy Week. 
 
Event: "Boosting the energy-efficiency services market in Europe", 25 February 2015, Brussels, an official side session in the framework of the conference "Heating and Cooling in the European Energy Transition" held by the European Commission. 
 
Publication: A chapter on energy-efficiency services within "The Guidebook on strong implementation of the Energy Efficiency Directive (2012/27/EU)". 
 
Projects: currently partnerof the H2020 "QualitEE" project and previously member of the Steering Committee of the Transparense project developing the European Code of Conduct for Energy Performance Contracting. As of 1st September 2015: European co-administrator of the European Code of Conduct for Energy Performance Contracting.
goals__remit: EFIEES' purpose is to promote activities of private Energy Efficiency Services Companies (EESCs) in the European Union. These companies design and implement practical measures to improve energy efficiency of their customers by the means of energy-efficiency services contracts. Their objective is to optimise the energy management of end-users.
